youtubeDownloaderPage.mainDescription: Download your favorite YouTube videos and playlists quickly and easily.

youtubeDownloaderPage.errorNoItemsSelectedDesc: Please select at least one video from the playlist to download.
youtubeDownloaderPage.audioContainerNote: Select your preferred audio container. AAC offers wide compatibility, Opus offers better quality at lower bitrates. Actual availability depends on the source.

downloadsPage.mainDescription: Oversee active WebTorrent and Server downloads, and view your history.

serverDownloads.title: Active Server Downloads
serverDownloads.description: Status of downloads managed by the backend server.
serverDownloads.noActiveDescription: Downloads initiated via 'Download (Server)' will appear here.

history.title: Download History (WebTorrent)
history.alertDescription: This action will permanently delete your WebTorrent download history. This cannot be undone.
history.noHistoryDescription: Completed or failed WebTorrent downloads will appear here.

downloadsPage.downloadStalledMessage: Download stalled. Check connection or peers.
downloadsPage.toastPreparingStreamDesc: Attempting to stream the largest file...
downloadsPage.toastStreamFailedDescNoStart: Could not start torrent for streaming. Ensure it's a valid magnet with seeders.
downloadsPage.toastStreamFailedDescNoPrepare: Could not prepare the file for streaming. Ensure torrent has files, is active, and has seeders.
downloadsPage.toastRetryNotNeededDesc: might already be active or an error occurred during re-add. Check active downloads.
downloadsPage.toastRetryFailedNoMagnet: Magnet URI not found for this item.
downloadsPage.toastWebTorrentRemovedDesc: The torrent has been removed from active queue.
downloadsPage.toastAria2TaskRemovedDesc: removed from local tracking. (Backend action needed)
downloadsPage.toastAria2FileErrorDesc: Download URL not available or task not complete.
downloadsPage.toastHistoryClearedDesc: Your download history has been successfully cleared.

appearance.title: Appearance & Theme
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application.
appearance.note: Theme changes are applied live and saved locally in your browser. Some changes may require a refresh for full effect across all components.

downloadPrefs.title: Download Preferences
downloadPrefs.locationDescription: WebTorrent downloads go to your browser's default. Server downloads are on the server. For local saving with server downloads, ensure Aria2 is configured locally or use a browser extension to intercept.
downloadPrefs.locationNote: Direct folder selection is experimental and relies on browser File System Access API (if supported and permission granted). Downloads may still go to default browser location if API is unavailable or permission denied.
downloadPrefs.qualityDescription: This preference guides server-side downloads when multiple qualities are available. WebTorrent quality depends on the specific magnet link.
downloadPrefs.performanceNote: Higher quality downloads require more bandwidth and storage. Download speeds depend on seeders for torrents and server capacity.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Manage application data stored in your browser.
dataManagement.historyDescription: Clear your locally stored history of WebTorrent downloads.
dataManagement.alertDescription: Are you sure you want to clear your WebTorrent download history? This action cannot be undone.
dataManagement.storageNote: Settings and download history are stored in your browser's local storage. Clearing your browser data may remove these.

settingsPage.toastHistoryClearedDesc: Your download history has been successfully cleared.
settingsPage.toastFolderSelectedDesc: Download location preference updated. Actual saving behavior depends on browser support and permissions.
settingsPage.toastFolderSelectionFailedDesc: Could not set download location. Ensure your browser supports the File System Access API and you've granted permission.

aboutPage.mainSubtitle: Your Ultimate Movie and TV Series Companion

missionStory.title: Our Mission & Story
missionStory.p1: ChillyMovies was born from a passion for cinema and television, and a desire to create a seamless, enjoyable experience for discovering, organizing, and accessing your favorite content. We aim to provide a premium, user-friendly platform that respects your preferences and puts you in control.
missionStory.p2: Our journey is one of continuous improvement, driven by community feedback and the evolving landscape of digital entertainment. We're committed to building a tool that's not just functional, but a joy to use.

keyFeatures.title: Key Features
keyFeatures.description: Here's what makes ChillyMovies stand out:
featuresList: Extensive Library: Discover movies and TV series from a vast, up-to-date catalog.
Advanced Search & Filtering: Find exactly what you're looking for with powerful search and intuitive filters by genre, year, and origin.
YouTube Downloader: Easily download videos and audio from YouTube with quality selection.
Download Management: Robust in-browser (WebTorrent) and server-side (Aria2) download capabilities.
Detailed Information: Access comprehensive details, trailers, cast, and recommendations for every title.
Personalized Experience: Customize theme accents and download preferences.
Responsive Design: Enjoy a seamless experience across desktop and mobile devices.
Bilingual Support: Currently supporting English and Swahili for a wider audience.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: New to ChillyMovies? Hereâ€™s how to get started quickly:

steps.title: Explore
steps.content: Browse popular movies and TV series on the Home page, or use the Discover sections for Movies and TV Series with filters.

steps.title: Search
steps.content: Use the live search bar in the sidebar to quickly find specific titles.

steps.title: Download
steps.content: On any movie or TV series page, find download options. Choose WebTorrent for in-browser downloads or Server Download for backend processing.

steps.title: YouTube
steps.content: Navigate to the YouTube Downloader, paste a link, fetch info, and select your desired format and quality.

steps.title: Manage
steps.content: Keep track of your downloads on the Downloads page and clear history in Settings.

steps.title: Customize
steps.content: Personalize your theme and download preferences in the Settings page.

versionNext.title: Version & What's Next
versionNext.roadmapP1: We're constantly working to enhance ChillyMovies. Here are some features we're excited about for future releases:
roadmapItems: User accounts and synchronization across devices.
Advanced download scheduling and management for server downloads.
Integration with more content sources and providers.
More robust community features and discussions.
versionNext.stayTuned: Stay tuned for updates and new features!

techAttributions.title: Technology & Attributions
techAttributions.intro: ChillyMovies is built using a variety of modern web technologies. We also rely on and are grateful for the following APIs and libraries:

techList.value: React framework for server-side rendering and static site generation.
The Movie Database for movie and TV series metadata.
For in-browser torrent streaming and downloading.
For YouTube video information and download stream generation.
For a clean and consistent icon set.

techAttributions.outro: This project is for educational and demonstration purposes. Please respect copyright laws and support content creators by subscribing to legal streaming services and purchasing content.
